name: Unnatural Selection (itch) (Mathigoful)
description:
In a near future, where Humans are living in space bases and artificial planets, they unfortunately encounter a boom in babies birth.

Play as the guard, and throw the babies in space, in order to regulate the population in the spaceship and become the best month employee. Or play the boy, saves those unfortunates children from a certain death, and light your path towards a great future.

Xbox Controllers Needed /!\

As the boy (P1) :
A - Grab the child
X - Throw the child
Y - Go through traps
Goal : Throw the childs to the right hole

As the guard (P2) :
A - Grab the boy or the child
X - Throw the boy or the child
Y - Slap the boy in order to make him release the child
Goal : Throw the childs or player to the left hole
